entry.title: SMOG WARNING ENDED, Bagotville

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
